__e: The jury believed Mike, ignored the facts and the law, did what they knew was right.
The only time in my life That I followed my own heart and ignored the others was the day I married you
For instance, I've spent most of the last week just... blind, not even seeing someone who has... been doing the absolute best they can. Whose feelings I have completely ignored.
Whoever did this ignored the drugs, took a gang member.
Because there was no bomb over there, we figured there was no bomb over here, so we ignored the call.
And,luther,I think the bigger question is not why I feel a part of them, but why you don'T.
So I ignored him and left his office, 'cause I do what I want.
I thought it was stupid, and as soon as I could, I ignored it and ate whatever I wanted.
I told him you were too busy to see him, but, as you see, he ignored me and, by implication, you.
